basic_information.scholarship_name: The Crossland Family Engineering Support Scholarship Fund

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science majoring in Engineering and Physics. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Engineering and/or Physics majors Full-time undergraduate student In good academic and social standing with the University Have financial need as recognized through the Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA) Two faculty letters of recommendation

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
